name: CATastrophe (Mendy, LampLan404, ScottC05)
description:
What a CATastrophe! 

You play as Agent 135 and your mission is to aid the scientists trying to save the world from a deadly virus. They discovered a cure, but to make it, they require substances that can only be found on the surface of celestial bodies.

Space travel hasn't been invented yet, so the only choice you have is to go back in time to the Paleolithic Era and bring back 3 shooting stars - otherwise known as the meteors that hit the planet 66 million years ago.

Watch out for the meteor's master - Meteoron. Some say he still guards its treasure to this day. You must defeat him to finish the job, before returning.

Jump in your time machine and get to work!

Created as part of the Weekly Game Jam 135.
